body_html:
After that i think i should introduce this solve in detail ,
if you encounter
"An error ocurred while starting the kernel
cc:366 failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITALIZED
cc:4637 stream 000000000F5CB190 did not memcpy host-to-device; sorce:0000000204C00900
cc306 Error recording event in stream:error recording CUDA event on stream 0000000008C4220:
CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY; not marking stream as bad,as the Event object may be at fault. Monitor for further errors.
cc:49 Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\gpu\gpu_event_mgr.cc
Unexpected Event status:1"
maybe because cudnn is not match.

Then i set a new environment install tensorflow1.4 which has keras without install，but after installing i did not check GPU, just as reedwm say “other processes are using the GPU ”. So i restart the computer.
Thank you!

body:
After that i think i should introduce this solve in detail , 
if you  encounter 
"An error ocurred while starting the kernel
cc:366  failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITALIZED
cc:4637 stream 000000000F5CB190 did not memcpy host-to-device; sorce:0000000204C00900
cc306 Error recording event in stream:error recording CUDA event on stream 0000000008C4220:
CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY; not marking stream as bad,as the Event object may be at fault. Monitor for further errors. 
cc:49    Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\gpu\gpu_event_mgr.cc
 Unexpected Event status:1"
maybe because cudnn is not match. 

 Then i  set a new environment install tensorflow1.4 which has keras without install，but after installing i did not check GPU, just as reedwm say “other processes are using the GPU ”. So i restart the computer.
Thank you!
